entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return a VeloBand Pulse. It's not working properly.
Okay, I can certainly look into that for you. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
Thank you. One moment, please... Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. I see it was delivered on [date 15 days prior to call]. What seems to be the issue?
It's just not reading my heart rate accurately. I've tried everything. I want my money back.

I understand your frustration. Let me review our return policy for the VeloBand Pulse. Our standard policy allows for returns within 10 days of delivery. I see that today is [current date], making it 15 days since delivery. Unfortunately, that puts you outside the return window for a full refund.
What?! Are you serious? I just got this thing! Ten days? That's ridiculous! I want to speak to a manager. This is unacceptable!

I understand your frustration, sir/madam. I'm happy to check if a policy exception can be made. Just so I can be as helpful as possible, can you confirm that you have tried all troubleshooting steps on the VeloFit website?
Yes, I looked at the website! Nothing worked! This thing is junk!

Okay, I apologize it isn't working as expected. While I cannot offer a full refund outside of the 10-day return window, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase amount. This will allow you to choose another VeloFit product that better suits your needs, or wait for a newer version of the VeloBand Pulse to become available. Would that be acceptable?
Store credit? So, I can't get my money back at all?
That is correct. The return window has passed. However, store credit would allow you to get something of equal value from VeloFit.
Ugh, fine. I guess store credit is better than nothing. How does that work?

Great. I've added the store credit to your account, which is linked to [customer email address]. When you're ready to make another purchase, the credit will automatically be applied during checkout. You’ll see it reflected in your balance. The store credit never expires, so take your time to find the perfect VeloFit product.
Okay, I see it now. Thanks.
You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help.
You're welcome. Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
